subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki scored 13 of his 27 points in the fourth quarter, and the Mavericks extended their season-high winning streak to 11 games with a victory against the Bulls.
snippet: Dirk Nowitzki scored 13 of his 27 points in the fourth quarter, and the Mavericks extended their season-high winning streak to 11 games with a victory against the Bulls.
